shared.model

Class Municipality

  • java.lang.Object
    • shared.model.Municipality

  • public class Municipality
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a city or a settlement that has been placed on a vertex between hexes. Contains reference to the vertex and the player that owns it.
    Author:
    Jordan
